name: Zylaria™
description: Zylaria™ (Xylaria nigripes), a unique species of Xylaria promoting gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA) function to support relaxation and normal sleep quality. Zylaria™, developed by NuLiv Science, belongs to a specific subgenus of Xylaria that is exclusively hidden deep down in the dirt lies nutritious, yet obscure fungi hidden within the nest of the Odontotermes formosanus termite.
